mapper.update: UPDATE userinfo SET state=#{state} WHERE uid=#{uid}
UPDATE userinfo SET trueName=#{trueName} WHERE uid=#{uid}
UPDATE userinfo SET havingClass=#{classId} WHERE uid=#{uid}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO userinfo(uid,username,password,email,code,state,phone,uclassNumber,trueName,schoolId,havingClass) value(#{uid},#{username},#{password},#{email},#{code},#{state},#{phone},#{uclassNumber},#{trueName},#{schoolId},#{havingClass}) on duplicate key update password=VALUES(password),email=VALUES(email),phone=VALUES(phone)
